amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 117-75 as en bloc No. 3: Nos. 6, 8, 21, 40, 41, 45, 77, 78, 79, 80, 81, 82, 98, 107, 120, 122, 125, 134, and 135.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 3 comprised of amendments numbered 6, 8, 21, 40, 41, 45, 77, 78, 79, 80, 81, 82, 98, 107, 120, 122, 125, 134, and 135, printed in House Report 117-75.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendments (A004) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 180 - 226 (Roll no. 202).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
